name: The Right Gift
description:
This game is a split screen experience and must have 2 players. 

Player 1 is a Toy and must hide away from a child by entering a present scattered around the map. The toy must survive without getting caught 

Player 2 is a child who is seeking the toy that escaped the cabin. When player 2 finds the right present, open it and "SURPRISE" the chase begins. The child must catch and knockout the toy to win. 

There are three phases. Hide, Seek, Chase. Make sure to check the controls before playing.

Made in Unity Engine.
